channel.title: Sftp on Technical Solutions for the 10X Engineers
channel.description: Recent content in Sftp on Technical Solutions for the 10X Engineers

item.title: Optimizing TCP Performance with Version Control and Virtual Machines
item.description: Listen to the interview with our engineer: Optimizing TCP Performance with Version Control and Virtual Machines Introduction Welcome back to another exciting post on the ShitOps engineering blog, where we dive deep into all things tech and explore groundbreaking solutions that are sure to revolutionize the industry. Today, we will tackle a pressing problem faced by our company—suboptimal TCP performance—and present an innovative solution that will undoubtedly blow your mind.

item.title: Revolutionizing Data Transfer with Serverless AirPods Pro Integration through SFTP, Amazon AWS
item.description: Introduction Data transfer has always been an issue for most companies as it is difficult to securely send data from one location to the other. The use of Secure File Transfer Protocol (SFTP) and cloud services like Amazon Web Services (AWS) has made the transfer possible but still with some limitations. Our company, ShitOps, faced a similar challenge when we had to transfer large amounts of data daily between two important locations.
